title: Dr. Agatho Report
description:
Description :
        Five years after the end of the war-.The victorious nation of Formapolis has become accustomed to peace, but something strange is happening.The illegal dumping of bizarrely shaped corpses called "experiments".Klein, a detective in charge of the Special Case Unit, is ordered by the government to investigate the case thoroughly and is assisted by an assistant, Dr. Agato.But this man, who seems to be hiding a secret, has forgotten his identity as a prisoner of war from a defeated country and is trying to seduce his partner, a state official.As Klein becomes embroiled with the unstoppable Dr. Agato, Hecomes face-to-face with Tristan, the psychic man at the center of this bizarre case.It turns out that Dr. Agato was once his 'researcher',Tristan was his 'test subject', and the secret is that they had an intimate relationship. ......."I wanted to see you again, Doctor."+
